english_text: Stay hungry, stay foolish.
chinese_text: 求知若饥，虚心若愚。

english_text: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
chinese_text: 爱是唯一能将敌人变为朋友的力量。

english_text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
chinese_text: 成功不是终点，失败也不是末日，最重要的是继续前进的勇气。

english_text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
chinese_text: 真正的智慧是知道自己一无所知。

english_text: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
chinese_text: 动力让你开始，习惯让你坚持。

english_text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
chinese_text: 当你忙于制定其他计划时，生活已经发生。

english_text: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
chinese_text: 幸福取决于我们自己。

english_text: The simple act of caring is heroic.
chinese_text: 关心他人本身就是一种英雄行为。

english_text: Family and friendships are two of the greatest facilitators of happiness.
chinese_text: 家庭和友谊是幸福的两大源泉。

english_text: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
chinese_text: 永远面向阳光，阴影就会落在你身后。

english_text: Dreams are the seeds of change. Nothing ever grows without a seed, and nothing ever changes without a dream.
chinese_text: 梦想是改变的种子。没有种子就没有成长，没有梦想就没有改变。

english_text: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.
chinese_text: 爱不设障碍。它跨越障碍，穿越围墙，满怀希望到达终点。

english_text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
chinese_text: 成功就是在一次次失败中依然充满热情地前行。

english_text: Wisdom begins in wonder.
chinese_text: 智慧始于好奇。

english_text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
chinese_text: 取得进步的秘诀就是开始行动。

english_text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
chinese_text: 生活其实很简单，但我们总是把它复杂化。

english_text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
chinese_text: 幸福不是现成的，它来自你的行动。

english_text: Compassion is the basis of morality.
chinese_text: 同情是道德的基础。

english_text: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
chinese_text: 幸福的家庭就是人间天堂。

english_text: Choose to be optimistic, it feels better.
chinese_text: 选择乐观，感觉会更好。

english_text: The best way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
chinese_text: 开始的最好方法就是停止空谈并开始行动。

english_text: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
chinese_text: 不要让你不能做的事妨碍你能做的事。

english_text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
chinese_text: 在事情完成之前，总觉得不可能。

english_text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
chinese_text: 我们实现明天目标的唯一障碍，是今天的疑虑。

english_text: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
chinese_text: 幸福不是偶然，而是选择。

english_text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
chinese_text: 人生最大的荣耀不在于从不跌倒，而在于每次跌倒后都能站起来。

english_text: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
chinese_text: 爱与被爱，如同阳光照耀的两面。

english_text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
chinese_text: 心念即一切，你所想即你所成。

english_text: Kindness is a language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
chinese_text: 善良是一种语言，聋子能听见，瞎子能看见。

english_text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
chinese_text: 千里之行，始于足下。

english_text: Where there is love there is life.
chinese_text: 有爱的地方就有生命。

english_text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
chinese_text: 成就伟业的唯一方法就是热爱你的工作。

english_text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
chinese_text: 设立新目标或梦想新梦想永远不嫌晚。

english_text: What we think, we become.
chinese_text: 我们思考什么，就会成为什么。

english_text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
chinese_text: 预测未来的最好方法就是创造未来。

english_text: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
chinese_text: 让我们始终以微笑相见，因为微笑是爱的开始。

english_text: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
chinese_text: 成功不是你攀登了多高，而是你对世界产生了多大的积极影响。

english_text: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.
chinese_text: 恶得以胜利，唯一需要的是好人什么都不做。

english_text: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.
chinese_text: 生命很短，由你让它变得甜美。

english_text: The most wasted of all days is one without laughter.
chinese_text: 一天中最浪费的，就是没有笑声的一天。

english_text: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
chinese_text: 朋友是了解你一切却依然爱你的人。

english_text: It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy that makes happiness.
chinese_text: 让我们感到幸福的不是拥有多少，而是享受多少。

english_text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
chinese_text: 我们人生的目标就是幸福。

english_text: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
chinese_text: 世界上最美好和最美丽的东西是看不见也摸不着的——它们必须用心去感受。

english_text: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
chinese_text: 无论你去哪里，都要全心投入。

english_text: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
chinese_text: 我们唯一要害怕的就是害怕本身。

english_text: The best mirror is an old friend.
chinese_text: 最好的镜子是老朋友。

english_text: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
chinese_text: 幸福就是你的想法、言语和行为一致。

english_text: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
chinese_text: 最大的财富是知足常乐。

english_text: The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up.
chinese_text: 让自己振作起来的最好方法是去让别人振作起来。

english_text: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
chinese_text: 真正的朋友是在全世界都离开你时还会走进你身边的人。

english_text: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
chinese_text: 教育的根是苦的，但其果实是甜的。

english_text: Let your life lightly dance on the edges of time like dew on the tip of a leaf.
chinese_text: 让你的生命像叶尖上的露珠一样，在时间的边缘轻轻舞动。

english_text: Forgiveness is the fragrance that the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it.
chinese_text: 宽恕是紫罗兰留在踩踏它的脚后跟上的香气。
